scripts.build: npm run model-build && tsc && vite build
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm install && npm run build && npm run test
scripts.repo-tag: REPO_VERSION=`node -e "console.log(require('./package').version)"` && echo TAG: pdm-frontend-v$REPO_VERSION && git -u . && git commit -m pdm-frontend-v$REPO_VERSION && git push && git tag pdm-frontend-v$REPO_VERSION && git push --tags
scripts.invcf: echo AWS_PROFILE=$AWS_PROFILE && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id DISTID --paths "/*"
scripts.dev-deploy: npm run reset && npm run dev-deploy-quick
scripts.dev-deploy-quick: echo AWS_PROFILE=$AWS_PROFILE && npm run build && npm run test && npm run repo-tag && serverless client deploy && npm run invcf
